# The `MemIntrinsicSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> is used for target intrinsics that touch memory and need an associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand">MachineMemOperand</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> is used for target intrinsics that touch memory and need an associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand">MachineMemOperand</a>.

Its opcode may be INTRINSIC&#95;VOID, INTRINSIC&#95;W&#95;CHAIN, PREFETCH, or a target-specific memory-referencing opcode (see <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagtargetinfo/#a3c0c3b26a895016d5ee61ee67b858e1c">SelectionDAGTargetInfo::isTargetMemoryOpcode</a></code>).

Definition at line 1601 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
